channel.title: Help plz!

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @maxxy maxxy
item.description:
@maxxy wrote:

plz help ive been posting all day and no one helps im having trouble with something.

i want someone to only be able to open a chest with a key and this is what i put and its wrong!

case 8988: //Dragon Full Helm Chest (99 def)
if(playerLevel[1] >= 99) 
if (playerHasItemAmount(1543, 1) == true); 
{
setAnimation(2109);
sendMessage("Congrats on 99 Defence!");
addItem(15195, 1);
}
else {
if (playerHasItemAmount(1543, 1) == false);
setAnimation(3170);
sendMessage("You need a red key and 99 defence to open me!");
}
break;

Read full topic
